page.title: 06Gretton child's leisure time
page.content: When Joe Parman of Stafford Rd.Gretton goes to bed he is read a story by one of his parents and often reads other books himself.He is always asleep by 8 o'clock.Friday evening is the exception as he often goes swimming with his family in Rothwell and has a late tea with his aunt and her family in Desborough.In summertime Joe goes out to play with his friends before and after tea,very often on his bicycle, near the house or on the edge of the recreation field close by.In wintertime he plays indoors with jigsaws,games,toy cars etc.sometimes drawing,colouring or watching T.V.too.He likes cartoons,the "A"Team and"Crackerjack". His favourite game in the summer is French cricket,where a player stands defending his legs with a bat,while his opponents forming a circle round him bowl underarm at him with a soft ball.
